svt_axi_reg_adapter Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_axi_reg_adapter:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The svt_axi_reg_adapter encapsulates the master reg transaction class, This class contains the uvm_sequence_item reg2bus and uvm_sequence_item bus2reg implementation for AXI
